name: vscode-git-dirty-alert
description: Show a red status bar indicator when the working tree has uncommitted changes.

commands.title: Git Dirty Alert: Open Source Control

gitDirtyAlert.pollingSeconds.description: Polling interval in seconds for checking git status.
gitDirtyAlert.pollingSeconds.markdownDescription: Polling interval in seconds for checking git status. Min: 10, recommended: 30+.

gitDirtyAlert.includeUntracked.description: Include untracked files in the dirty count.

gitDirtyAlert.debug.description: Enable debug logging to the Output panel.
